Pantagora Hotel is located just 5 minutes from the main park and our beautiful cathedral, thanks to her our town is known as "The City of Torres Blancas". The rooms feature modern décor and sencilla.Todas include cable TV, private bathroom with toiletries kit, minibar and wifi, also has an outdoor pool, function room, Room Service, Private parking, gym and sauna. ADDRESS: Calle 4 No. 2-159 Av Fundadores. ROOM TYPE: STANDARD SUITE $ 116,000 and $ 166.000.TEL Reception:3138442772 - 3138452530 and email pantagorahotel@hotmail.com

The Los Nevados National Natural Park was created by the Colombian state on April 30, 1974, in order to contribute to the conservation of important ecosystems globally and 3 glaciers left for the country (Nevados del Ruiz, Nevado Santa Isabel and Nevado del Tolima), ecosystem super-paramo, paramo, high Andean wetlands, high Andean forest and Andean

In the year 1,970 with the cooperation of all residents a chapel whose first priest was Father Medina was built, although in the days of the founding Father Agustin Reyes had officiated a Mass having as Altar the trunk of a cedar freshly cut the landlady and owner of this parish is Our Lady of Carmen and the party in his honor is held every year is always cause for fraternal meeting of the entire city and every village in Líbano ".".
